description: Defines the data class 'Note' representing a note stored in the local database, with Room annotations for database mapping.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Data class representing a note entity with database annotations, including fields for id, title, content, pinned status, and last updated timestamp.

methods.name: Note (primary constructor)
methods.description: Creates a new Note instance with specified title, content, pinned status, and auto-generates id and updatedAt timestamp.
